name: Anvar‚Äôs Restaurant
address: 241 Brighton Beach Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11235, USA

reviews.text: I'm happy üòä

Andre was fabulous and we had the best meal. Kebabs, mimosas, the best bread, samsa and the best service. Breakfast in Brighton was a must for us and we were totally satisfied. Will return again!!! Thank you for your hospitalityüíï
Sehr frisch und lecker!!! Ich kann es zu 100% empfehlen. Die Preise sind auch besser / fairer als an der Strand-Promenade.

üá∫üá≤ A pleasant, calm, homely environment in Anvar's Restaurant.
Delicious fresh food, and salads.  Attention to each guest from the service staff and owners.
Pleasantly impressed.
We will definitely come back and not just once! ‚òùÔ∏èüôÇ
Thank you for holiday at your place from our two Birthday boys and guests.ü•≥üôèüíõüíôüëç
I highly recommend Anvar's restaurant.
$30 for a basic burger & fries  is ridiculous for what it was, a small burger( McDonald's size)  The fries are great and the waitresses were nice but There's better spots on Brighton to get a burger
Very good taste food was amazing thank you üôèüèª atmosphere is the best Anvar Restaurant excellent I recommend for all people welcome try then your feeling good
Nice food! Elvira is very good!
Very good place
Amazing food! One of the best meals I had in a while. The staff is very friendly and attentive. The perfect spot for brunch with friends or dinner. I will be coming back.

Clean place. However we were waiting for like 30mins for the food and there‚Äôs not really other customers during lunch. The dish is small and price is high, which is ok. Which I don‚Äôt really understand is that they charge you 10% service fee and the waitress said the service fee doesn‚Äôt include tips, that means you pay extra 30% on top of the menu price plus tax. Nothing fancy about the service, in other places, the server pours water/beverage into your cup and here you have to do it yourself.
Very tasty and comfortable
Amazing food. Very nice and personable service. Great new favorite in the area! Must visit!

We were looking for a dinner spot on Wednesday night and came across this gem. When I called ahead, the staff was incredibly friendly and happy to accommodate us with a 9 p.m. reservation.

The food was really good ‚Äî the manty is an absolute must-try! The service was attentive and warm, and the restaurant itself was really authentic. A great experience all around. Highly recommended!

We visited your restaurant yesterday and were truly impressed! We want to sincerely thank the entire team ‚Äî the service was outstanding. The waitstaff were very attentive, took all our preferences into account, helped us with our choices, and created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

The food was not just delicious ‚Äî it was exceptional! Everything was prepared with great care, beautifully presented, and full of rich flavor. You can really feel the quality and attention to detail in every dish.

What touched us the most was the thoughtful gesture at the end of the evening ‚Äî we were served a complimentary cake from the house. It was such a lovely and unexpected surprise, and it truly made our night special.

Thank you for your care, the wonderful atmosphere, and the incredible food. We will definitely come back again and recommend your restaurant to our friends!

Anvar‚Äôs Restaurant, nestled in a charming brick building, offers a delightful dining experience with a trendy twist. The interior boasts exposed brick walls, a lush green ceiling, and vibrant floral arrangements, creating a fresh, inviting atmosphere. The open kitchen and sleek bar area add a modern touch, while the outdoor patio with artificial turf is perfect for sunny days. The staff is attentive, and the space feels cozy yet stylish, ideal for casual meals or intimate gatherings. A great spot for those seeking a visually appealing dining setting with a welcoming vibe.

The Best Shashlik in New York ‚Äî No Exaggeration!

We visited Anvar‚Äôs Restaurant today, and it was an absolute culinary delight. We were served this incredible platter (see photo) ‚Äî a variety of shashlik skewers. Chicken, lamb, lula kebab, beef ‚Äî everything was so juicy, flavorful, and perfectly grilled that it‚Äôs hard to describe in words!

I‚Äôve lived in Moscow for many years and tried shashlik in many places, but even there I never tasted anything this good. The aroma of the spices, the tenderness of the meat, and the beautiful presentation ‚Äî it was all top-level.

I truly believe this is the best shashlik in all of New York, maybe even in the entire U.S. Highly recommended for anyone craving authentic Eastern flavors!

We visited your restaurant and were truly impressed! We want to sincerely thank the entire team ‚Äî the service was outstanding. The waitstaff were very attentive, took all our preferences into account, helped us with our choices, and created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

The food was not just delicious ‚Äî it was exceptional! Everything was prepared with great care, beautifully presented, and full of rich flavor. You can really feel the quality and attention to detail in every dish.

What touched us the most was the thoughtful gesture at the end of the evening ‚Äî we were served a complimentary cake from the house. It was such a lovely and unexpected surprise, and it truly made our night special.

Thank you for your care, the wonderful atmosphere, and the incredible food. We will definitely come back again and recommend your restaurant to our friends!

Anvar‚Äôs restaurant is nothing short of a ‚ÄúWow!‚Äù From the moment I stepped in, I knew I had found something special ‚Äî a rare gem in Brighton Beach, where most restaurants just don‚Äôt impress me. But this one? It blew me away.

The food at Anvar‚Äôs is to die for. Every dish feels like it was made just for you, with the kind of care and warmth you'd expect from your best friend‚Äôs kitchen. It‚Äôs comforting, delicious, and undeniably homemade in the best possible way. I‚Äôve tried many items on the menu, and I honestly can‚Äôt pick a favorite ‚Äî they‚Äôre all outstanding.

And let me just say this: their home fries are the best in all of New York State. Yes, really. Perfectly cooked, not greasy, and packed with flavor ‚Äî they‚Äôre a reason to come back all on their own.

What sets Anvar‚Äôs apart isn‚Äôt just the amazing food. The staff are warm, welcoming, and genuinely kind. Every visit feels like coming home.

Another rare and important point: I‚Äôve never felt sick after eating here ‚Äî something that sadly can‚Äôt be said for many other spots around the city. Anvar‚Äôs uses real ingredients, and they don‚Äôt over-salt their food like so many others do. The result? Flavors that are balanced, fresh, and clean.

Every time I go, I discover something new to love. If you‚Äôre in Brighton Beach ‚Äî or even if you‚Äôre not ‚Äî make the trip. Anvar‚Äôs isn‚Äôt just a restaurant. It‚Äôs an experience. One you‚Äôll want to have again and again.

Authentic food and atmosphere that‚Äôs true to the neighborhood. Service was excellent and attentive. Restaurant was extra clean and bright. One of the few options in the area open relatively later. A must try!
The food was not fresh; instead of freshly cooked kebab, they just reheated it in a microwave. The taste was disgusting.
Excellent restaurant. I recommend it to everyone. Today the whole family was there and we ate very tasty.
Nice atmosphere.

The menu looked pretty good, but the actual food was not all that.  Pretty much all of the food was oversalted and when it comes to the meat kebabs nor really a good sign.  Yes the place was pretty packed and it seems like they were short staffed.  While the waiters did try they were still missing things, such as giving napkins, so actually grabbed them ourselves from the bar.  Another thing that found odd was the fact that some of the food that was ordered was brought in from outside and not from the kitchen that is open right in the back.
Cute place love it
Perfect place to spend a perfect time ‚ù§Ô∏è
Very tasty cuisine.
I visited the restaurant on Sunday afternoon. I recommend here to anyone. Delicious food and meat!
That was the best food and service! The food is fresh and delicious. Thank you

My family and I attended a private event held at this restaurant recently. I was not as familiar with Turkish / Russian cuisine, but oh man I definitely am now! The food was absolutely delicious! It was hot and so flavorful. The salmon and chicken kebabs were my personal favorite. Each course came out with such professionalism and care. We loved the atmosphere, and all the servers were so attentive. We will definitely be returning just to have dinner during a normal day in the future. I would say Anvar's Restaurant is perfect for both large gatherings and casual dinners! I highly recommend this place!
Big selection of sweet and salty treats, the place is very nice and clean, staff very attentive. Excellent for a quite cozy breakfast.

One of the best Dinner I've ever had in my life. The atmosphere, the ambience, the food, the service, the music, the aroma and then the personal touch by the owner, simply out of this world.
The newly renovated restaurant is marvel. If you have not visited it till now, then you're missing a rare gem.
You won't be disappointed, I guarantee üíØ.

Just tried Anvar‚Äôs restaurant in Brooklyn, and it was fantastic! The flavors were fresh and authentic, and the service was warm and inviting. The staff was friendly and attentive, making sure we had a great experience. Highly recommend the steak and Spanish style beef tongue - it‚Äôs a must-try! Looking forward to coming back soon.

I passed by this place a couple of times and finally gave it a try. When I walked in, I was seated very quickly and they offered me some off menu specials. I chose the tuna salad and salmon shrimp plate, it was absolutely amazing. They came out soon after I ordered and I was very pleasantly surprised at how low the bill was. I suggest that if you have the chance try this new place.

My sister recommended this place and we decided to give it a try. I enjoyed the food, it was delicious and unique. Nice and cozy, very inviting atmosphere with polite staff. If you want to try  juicy, flavorful salmon, this is the place to go!

I had the pleasure of visiting a brand-new restaurant in Brooklyn. The shish kebab was cooked to perfection on real hardwood charcoal. The salads were fresh and prepared right in front of us. The waiting staff were very knowledgeable and created a positive atmosphere. The way they served the main dish with a fire show and perfect music made my day. I definitely recommend this place if you are in Brooklyn. Ask for their tuna salad; it will not disappoint you.

My first impression was incredible, the owner and manager Mrs: Rano, very friendly and cordial, the food was delicious.
I decided that every week that  I  come to Brighton Beach in my beautiful Brooklyn this will be my restaurant to visit and enjoy. On this visit Mrs: Rano prepared me a delicious salmon with white sauce.
with pleasure
Nancy Alper

New restaurant along Brighton Beach Ave, swift & attentive, welcoming uncluttered space with quiet ambiance in an indoor setting, good for groups or solo, flavorful
Baked trout with roasted vegetables worth trying
If you are in New York, I recommend you definitely to go there! Nice place with amazing food and best service. We got the perfect service by  Khayrullo. You are the best guysüôè

I confidently recommend this restaurant to anyone who values quality cuisine and a pleasant atmosphere. This place is definitely worth a visit!

The space is cozy and warm, yet very stylish. The service is excellent. The waitstaff are polite, always ready to suggest something from the menu, and never keep you waiting long. You can tell they genuinely care about the guests' comfort.

The food is beyond praise! I ordered the shashlik, which was delicious and juicy. The salad was also tasty. I ended the evening with cheesecake ‚Äî it was so tender that it was hard to stop eating it.
I revisited my favorite restaurant, and once again it exceeded my expectations. The rack of lamb was absolutely delicious and its my new favorite!

I went to the restaurant to get a seat for three people. There were no free seats. I was told to wait 10-15 minutes. I waited for a long time. They made me realize that they remembered about me. After a while, two tables were vacated at once, which can be used separately. I was told that I could not use them because they are designed for 6 seats. In the end I spent 37 minutes and left in a terrible mood. I do not advise anyone to go there.
